attributes.action: Scrap the dishonest terminology relating to sentences given by the courts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The courts should adopt an honest way in giving sentance. For example the word 'Life' SHOULD ONLY BE USED when it means life. If given six years or ten years,for example, the sentence to be served should be openly  explained in court, and should include time to be served in an open prison.
